Text: Hm?
He ran off!
I just have to be \n careful to avoid \n his secret weapon.

But I know that 
 dog'll make a break 
 for it the first moment 
 he gets.
Watch out, Pipi, I'm \n coming for you!
Sorry! I'll put \n the dog down.
Huh?
Aaah! I've gotta \n put you down \n just one second.
Come on, Pipi, \n let's go home.
Pipi, no more \n running away, \n got it?
And after that water \n show, Pipi's tank has to \n be empty.
Well, maybe a little, \n but I'll survive.
He got away again! \n This is exhausting...
Ack! My suit!
Guess it's time \n to go ho- \n Wait...
Thank you so much \n for bringing Pipi back!

Shoot, Pipi's 
 secret weapon 
 is going into 
 overdrive.
Sorry it had to \n take so long...
Pipi didn't get \n you with his \n "you know"?
Gotcha!
Pipi! Calm down! \n Your owner's \n coming.
Gotcha!
I'm keeping you \n at a safe distance \n this time!
Nice try! \n Even you can't \n reach this far.
You know what? \n Forget dogs, \n I'm a cat girl.
Who knew it \n would be "that"?
Pipi looks happier \n than he's ever looked. \n He must've had fun.
Go ahead and \n do as much of that \n as you like.
Aww my clothes...
Now I know how \n to catch Pipi...

Well, he had a chance 
 to run and spray... 
 Guess that's all a dog 
 could want.
Meow!
And after all that work \n catching him...
But I can't give up, I \n promised that girl I'd \n get her dog back.

*Sigh* 
 Well, at least now 
 I know what 
 "you know" is...
Mommy, it's \n raining!

Uh-oh... 
 I think I know 
 what "you know" 
 means now.
Guess dogs can \n be kind of cute, \n can't they?
Why's it raining? \n Kind of smells too.
So it is... \n Wait... \n What is this stuff?
Shoot!
*Sniff* *Sniff*
Are you okay? \n What's wrong?

*Sniff* 
 I was taking Pipi 
 for a walk, 
 and he ran away.
I tried to catch him, \n but I fell... *Sniff* \n Stupid Pipi!
Who or what is Pipi?
I need to sneak up on Pipi from behind.
Catch the Dog
Pipi's making a break for it!
There's Pipi.
I need to get closer.
Guess I was too far.
Wait!
So close!
I almost caught him.
Why can't I catch him?
Pipi!
How am I supposed to catch that dog?
I need to sneak up on that dog somehow.
I'll catch Pipi this time.
I can't grab him when he's on the move.
I need to catch Pipi when he's staying still.
That sneaky little dog!
Pipi saw me!
I can't let that dog see me.
I need to sneak up on the dog.
I can't get too close or he'll see me.
Shoot, grabbed the wrong thing.
This isn't Pipi!
So close! My timing was just a little off.
Alright, Pipi, this is getting personal.
Is that Pipi?
He's a sneaky \n dog, it won't be \n easy to catch him.
That's why Mommy \n and Daddy usually \n walk him.
I wanted to show \n I could do it too.
*Sniff* What do \n I do now?
Don't cry, I'll go \n get Pipi for you.
You will? \n You can catch him?
Leave it to me, \n I'm good at this \n kind of thing.

A little gravity 
 shifting and I 
 should have Pipi 
 back in no time.
He got away!
I told you he \n was sneaky.
You were right... \n I have to get \n closer next time.
Could you wait here?
I'll go and grab him \n for you.
Okay... \n Just be careful.
When Pipi gets too \n excited, he does... \n You know.
You know?
Yeah, a big \n "you know."
I don't know...
But I better get after \n him before we lose him.
Pipi, you rat!
I can't seem to grab \n hold of him when \n he's running.
But I can't give \n up now...
I promised that \n little girl...
And I've gotta \n show that dog \n who's boss!
There he is... \n He's distracted \n by a smell.
Now's my chance \n to sneak up behind \n him.
Pipi went that way.
Chase the Dog
I need to catch Pipi.
